text: 2.4 Ais 30.18, Lom 3.25, Epe 1.7, 2.9, 2 Pi 3.9, 3.15 Tɨtay dup? God nɨbop yɨmug nɨŋɨd dɨtep gɨl, pel kod mɨdeb. Pen ne tap tɨmel gɨpɨm anɨb okok pen kasek gɨ tɨmel gin agɨl gos ma nɨgup. Dɨtep gep anɨb ak, nɨgem tap yokɨp olap tek lɨnɨmuŋ. God ne nɨbi tap si tap tɨmel gɨpɨm ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨnɨgabɨm agɨl gos nɨgup. Anɨgɨl gos nɨŋɨd, nɨbop yɨmug nɨŋɨd dɨtep gup. Anɨb ak ma nepɨm akaŋ?
